# The order of packages is significant, because pip processes them in the order
# of appearance. Changing the order has an impact on the overall integration
# process, which may cause wedges in the gate later.

# pbr should be first
pbr>=0.6,!=0.7,<1.0

argparse
iso8601>=0.1.9
keyring>=2.1
PrettyTable>=0.7,<0.8
pycrypto>=2.6
requests>=1.1
simplejson>=2.0.9
Babel>=1.3
six>=1.7.0
